name: Ultimania
description:
Level One Out Now!

Picture this: You Wake Up in an Unknown Facility, greeted by a robot intent on making sure you stay unconscious. You decide to run, with hopes to find out who was responible for you waking in the facility, why did you, and what is going to happen of all of this.
CONTROLS
WASD Keys or ARROW Keys to move
F for Slow Motion
E to Pick Up/Throw
Left Click with Desired Gun to Shoot/Grapple
Cannot Attack with Sword. If the Sword is Thrown at an Enemy, It will one shot them.
